sub_title: Teacher of Spanish as a foreign Language / Academic Coordinador
summary: I characterise myself as a responsible person who is constantly updated in my pedagogical practice to transmit knowledge that is consistent with the new academic and professional requirements demanded by the national and international market. Besides, I'm in search of the use of cutting-edge teaching tools to expedite the learning process. Also, I am able to find different connections between the context of the student and the correct use of the target language. Furthermore, I have assisted in creating various Syllabi and learning materials for multiple universities and have worked in the department coordinating the Spanish programme at National Pedagogical University (Colombia). Finally, I have taught the Evaluation Module at the Instituto Caro y Cuervo in 2013 when training new Spanish teachers in Colombia and Suriname.
